channel.title: Client Freezes when i want to Note something in Bank
channel.description:
Gday,
Using Project Insanity, Client 1 = clled, 602 client ###### Client 1 = New Bank && Client 2 = Old Bank [img]http://C:\Users\Blaak\Desktop\Proj_Ins_Test_Edit - Instellingen\Problem Noting.png[/img]
We'll, When i have like alot of ores on my bank.. for e.g. And I want to note them for "dropping or selling" my client freezes, and i need to start the client[1] again. Now I've found out, that when i'am on an other client[2], I can use note.
Just when i hit the "Note" button is freezes inmidiatly, even when i go over it when the mouse without clicking it.
Does this exist because of the client ?
Because there are more problems with this client, Like
I am invisible.. I can see duradel on client 2, and I cant see him on client 1,
Maybe some-one nice can help me fixing this problem, or just simply send me a link of a good client ;)
Tyvm,
White Santa

item.title: Client Freezes when i want to Note something in Bank
item.dc:creator: @MrSnow1 MrSnow1
item.description:
@MrSnow1 wrote:

Gday,

Using Project Insanity, Client 1 = clled, 602 client

Client 1 = New Bank && Client 2 = Old Bank

We’ll, When i have like alot of ores on my bank… for e.g.
And I want to note them for “dropping or selling” my client freezes, and i need to start the client[1] again.
Now I’ve found out, that when i’am on an other client[2], I can use note.

Just when i hit the “Note” button is freezes inmidiatly, even when i go over it when the mouse without clicking it.

Does this exist because of the client ?

Because there are more problems with this client, Like

I am invisible… I can see duradel on client 2, and I cant see him on client 1,

Maybe some-one nice can help me fixing this problem, or just simply send me a link of a good client

Tyvm,

White Santa
